frequently asked questions

FAQ

We’ve been passionate about achieving better results for our clients.

1. Am I eligible for a SLS loan? Why am I not qualified for a loan? − +
To qualify for a loan, you must be:
  • Be between 25 – 59 years old
  • Have a verifiable source of income
  • Live and / or work in cities where we operate
  • Have a savings or current bank account with any commercial bank
2. How much can I borrow and for how long? − +
You can get up to ₦4million for 12 months.
3. How do I apply? − +
Please visit our website www.sls.com to apply or call +234 90 2115 9180.
SLS
4. How long does it take to process a loan? − +
Your loan process can be completed in 24 hours provided all documents are valid & presented on application... SLS
5. What documents do I need to apply for a loan? − +
You need your bank statement, a government issued ID card and utility bill (optional).
6. Why does SLS need my BVN? − +
This is a CBN policy applicable to financial institutions as part of KYC requirements.
